housing_payment.evidence: Agent asked about rent/mortgage and customer provided $1,800/month.

auto_payment.evidence: Agent asked about vehicle payments. Customer said none.

utilities.evidence: Agent did not ask about utilities or household expenses.

other_debts_expenses.evidence: Agent skipped asking about other debts or monthly obligations.

violation_reason: Agent skipped 2 of 4 required budget input categories (utilities and other debts/expenses), failing to collect a complete financial picture.
key_evidence_quote: Agent moved directly from auto payment to program presentation without collecting utilities or other expenses.
